ED_Title: Election of the Executive Director of the United Nations Human Settlements Programme (UN-Habitat)
ED_DecisionText:
At its 75th plenary meeting, on 22 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the proposal of the Secretary-General,  elected Dato’ Maimunah Mohd Sharif (Malaysia) as Executive Director of the United Nations Human Settlements Programme (UN-Habitat) for a term of office of four years. 

      The effective date of her appointment would be communicated to the Assembly at a later stage.


(See A/72/PV.75)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/72/49 (Vol. II).
